com.google.crypto.tink

Interface PublicKeyVerify

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EcdsaVerifyJce, Ed25519Verify, RsaSsaPkcs1VerifyJce, RsaSsaPssVerifyJce

    public interface PublicKeyVerify
    Interface for public key signing.

    Digital Signatures provide functionality of signing data and verification of the signatures.

    Security guarantees

    The functionality of Digital Signatures is represented a pair of primitives (interfaces) PublicKeySign for signing of data, and PublicKeyVerify for verification of signatures. Implementations of these interfaces are secure against adaptive chosen-message attacks. Signing data ensures the authenticity and the integrity of that data, but not its secrecy.

    Since:
    1.0.0

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void verify(byte[] signature, byte[] data)
      Verifies whether signature is a valid signature for data.
